meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the September 4, 2024 City Council Meeting

agenda_items.title: Appointments to Boards and Commissions
agenda_items.description: Consideration of appointments to boards and commissions and the evaluation and duties of board and commission members.

agenda_items.title: Public Hearing on Property Tax Rate
agenda_items.description: A public hearing to receive comments on a $0.7047 per $100 assessed valuation property tax rate for the 2024-25 fiscal year.

agenda_items.title: Final Reading and Adoption of Appropriation Ordinance
agenda_items.description: Final reading and adoption of the appropriation ordinance appropriating funds for the FY 2024-25 City of Dallas Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets.

agenda_items.title: Setting the Tax Rate
agenda_items.description: An ordinance setting the tax rate at $0.7047 per $100 assessed valuation.

agenda_items.title: Ratifying Increase in Property Tax Revenues
agenda_items.description: A resolution ratifying the increase in total property tax revenues reflected in the FY 2024-25 budget.

agenda_items.title: Amending City Code
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending various chapters of the Dallas City Code regarding fees and regulations.

agenda_items.title: Amending Various City Codes
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending various sections of the Dallas City Code.

agenda_items.title: Position Changes and Salary Schedules
agenda_items.description: Authorize position changes and approval of salary schedules for fiscal year 2024-25.

agenda_items.title: Amending Personnel Rules
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 34, 'Personnel Rules' of the City Council Code.

agenda_items.title: Health Coverage Plans
agenda_items.description: Authorize approval of proposed health coverage plans and premium rates increase.

financial_items.description: FY 2024-25 City of Dallas Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets
Estimated Revenue from property tax increase
General Fund for various fees and services
Employee Benefits Fund for health coverage
